XHEADER.Title: Store an OpenStack connection settings if connection was successfull

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
! Publishing Connection info to VARA object if connection successful
! Check if existing connection to be overwritten :IF &UC4RB_OPS_OVERWRITE_CONN# EQ "YES" : PRINT "connection created or updated with name &UC4RB_OPS_CONN_NAME#" : PUT_VAR "PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.VARA.CONN_SETTINGS" , "&UC4RB_OPS_CONN_NAME#" , "&UC4RB_OPS_IDENTITY_URL#" , "&UC4RB_OPS_USERNAME#" , "&UC4RB_OPS_PASSWORD#" , "&UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_NAME#" :ELSE : SET &TEMP# = GET_VAR("PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.VARA.CONN_SETTINGS", "&UC4RB_OPS_CONN_NAME#") : IF &TEMP# EQ "" : PRINT "new connection created with name &UC4RB_OPS_CONN_NAME#" : PUT_VAR "PCK.AUTOMIC_OPENSTACK.PUB.VARA.CONN_SETTINGS" , "&UC4RB_OPS_CONN_NAME#" , "&UC4RB_OPS_IDENTITY_URL#" , "&UC4RB_OPS_USERNAME#" , "&UC4RB_OPS_PASSWORD#" , "&UC4RB_OPS_TENANT_NAME#" : ELSE : SET &STATUSFLAG# = "NO" : PRINT "connection already exist with name &UC4RB_OPS_CONN_NAME#" : EXIT 1 : ENDIF :ENDIF
